exceptions.summary: Thrown when the registry client is null.

memberSignatures.value: public SchemaRegistrySerializerBuilder (Confluent.SchemaRegistry.ISchemaRegistryClient registryClient, Chr.Avro.Abstract.ISchemaBuilder schemaBuilder = null, Chr.Avro.Representation.IJsonSchemaReader schemaReader = null, Chr.Avro.Representation.IJsonSchemaWriter schemaWriter = null, Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilder serializerBuilder = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Confluent.SchemaRegistry.ISchemaRegistryClient registryClient, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.ISchemaBuilder schemaBuilder, class Chr.Avro.Representation.IJsonSchemaReader schemaReader, class Chr.Avro.Representation.IJsonSchemaWriter schemaWriter, class Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilder serializerBuilder) cil managed

parameters.name: registryClient
parameters.summary: A client to use for Schema Registry operations. (The client will not be disposed.)

parameters.name: schemaBuilder
parameters.summary:
A schema builder (used to build a schema for a C# type when registering automatically).
            If none is provided, the default schema builder will be used.

parameters.name: schemaReader
parameters.summary:
A JSON schema reader (used to convert schemas received from the registry into abstract
            representations). If none is provided, the default schema reader will be used.

parameters.name: schemaWriter
parameters.summary:
A JSON schema writer (used to convert abstract schema representations when registering
            automatically). If none is provided, the default schema writer will be used.

parameters.name: serializerBuilder
parameters.summary:
A serializer builder (used to build serialization functions for C# types). If none is
            provided, the default serializer builder will be used.

parameters.name: registryConfiguration
parameters.summary:
Schema Registry configuration. Using the <see cref="T:Confluent.SchemaRegistry.SchemaRegistryConfig" /> class is
            highly recommended.

parameters.name: schemaBuilder
parameters.summary:
A schema builder (used to build a schema for a C# type when registering automatically).
            If none is provided, the default schema builder will be used.

parameters.name: schemaReader
parameters.summary:
A JSON schema reader (used to convert schemas received from the registry into abstract
            representations). If none is provided, the default schema reader will be used.

parameters.name: schemaWriter
parameters.summary:
A JSON schema writer (used to convert abstract schema representations when registering
            automatically). If none is provided, the default schema writer will be used.

parameters.name: serializerBuilder
parameters.summary:
A serializer builder (used to build serialization functions for C# types). If none is
            provided, the default serializer builder will be used.
